Zeus
Class MDVRP

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Zeus.MDVRP
public class MDVRP
extends java.lang.Object

Title: Zeus - Unified Object Oriented Model for Routeing and Schdeduling Problems

Description: The MDVRP, Multi-Depot Vehicle Routing Problem, consists of more than one depot used in solving a routing problem. A set of customers are to be serviced from multiple depots using trucks that can be used from any depot. The objective of the problem is to service the customers by first minimizing the total number of trucks required from each depot and second minimizing the total distance traveled by the trucks. The constraint is not to exceed the total capacity of the truck.

Reference: Put the name(s) of multi-depot papers

Copyright:(c) 2001-2003

Company:

Version:
1.0
Author:
Sam R. Thangiah

int Q

mainShipments

ShipmentLinkedList mainShipments
Customers read in from the data file are loaded into the ShipmentLinkedList instance named mainShipments. The mainShipments instance holds all of the shipments that are avaialble for routing. This list should not be used for manipulating the problem being solved. The list can be updated if a customer is added, deleted or edited.

mainDepots

DepotLinkedList mainDepots
The DepotLinkedList with instance mainDepots forms the root node that keeps track of the solution that has been obtained for the problem. From the mainDepots one can obtain the list of trucks and for each truck the list of customers for the problem.

Constructor Detail

MDVRP

public MDVRP(java.lang.String fileName)
Constructor for the MDVRP problem. Reads in the data from the file. Creates the required number of depots specified in the date file. Allocates the customers to the trucks. Performs the local optimization
Parameters:
fileName - Name of the file to be used for the problem
Method Detail

doExchanges

public void doExchanges()
Do the local exchanges for the depots. No parameters are passed as the mainDepots instance is used to access all the required information

getClosestShipmentMDVRP

public Shipment getClosestShipmentMDVRP(int depotNo,
                                        int type)

Create a depot with depot number and return the pointer of of the newly created depot node

Parameters:
depotNo - Depot number of the depot to assign a shipment.
type - Type of heuristic to be used to obtain the customer closest to the shipment
Returns:
Shipment The closest shipment to the depot based on the type of heuristic

Parameters:
MDVRPFileName - String type of the filename consisting of the data
Returns:
int Return 1 if all successful, 0 for failure

outputMDVRPShipData

public void outputMDVRPShipData(int type,
                                int noDepots,
                                java.lang.String fileName)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Method to output shipment information to a file shipLinkedList list for MDVRP starts with one, depots are n+1 to n+t, PTSP and PVRP start with depot at 0
Parameters:
type - Problem type, 0=MDVRP, 1=PTSP, 2=PVRP
noDepots - Number of depots or number of days in planning horizon
fileName - String name for the output file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Exception if file cannot be created
